original_text:
**INSTITUTION
GENERAL MEDICINE
ATTENDING PHYSICIAN PROGRESS NOTE
PATIENT NAME :
**NAME[AAA , BBB M]
ACCOUNT # :
**ID-NUM
**ROOM
ATTENDING PHYSICIAN :
**NAME[WWW M XXX]
ADMISSION DATE :
**DATE[Mar 12 2007]
EVALUATION DATE :
**DATE[Mar 16 07]
I personally interviewed and examined the patient today .
The patient continues to have lower abdominal pain , which is about the same as before .
She had a bowel movement overnight , which was nonbloody .
Her breathing is better .
She has some cough , but it is improved .
Not much shortness of breath .
She denies any fever or chills .
PHYSICAL EXAMINATION :
She is alert and oriented .
Her vital signs were reviewed .
Her vital signs are stable .
Blood pressure is generally around the 80s and 90s .
Her heart rate is stable and she is afebrile .
Her chest has bilateral rhonchi and wheezes .
Heart , regular rhythm .
Abdomen , no tenderness .
Extremities , no edema or tenderness .
LABORATORY DATA :
Laboratory tests were reviewed .
Her electrolytes are normal .
Her creatinine is 0.7 .
Her hemoglobin is 10.6 today .
Her platelet counts are normal .
PROBLEMS :
1. Abdominal aortic aneurysm .
We still think that she has had a leaking aortic aneurysm .
She has stabilized .
We have been discussing regarding transfer .
I have talked to her daughter and they are interested in going to a skilled nursing facility .
We are working to discharge her today to a skilled nursing facility .
Please consider this my discharge note .
A full note will be dictated separately summarizing all her problems .
I will plan to arrange skilled nursing facility today .
We will get her on her chronic medications .
Family understands that the patient is not operable , and she has elected not to consider surgery for aortic aneurysm and that she could die suddenly if it ruptures acutely .
2. COPD .
This is stable .
She will remain in bronchodilators .
3. Anemia .
Her hemoglobin and hematocrit have fallen but they are stable over the past 24 hours .
___________________________________
**NAME[WWW M. XXX] , M.D.
Dictator :
**NAME[WWW M. XXX] , M.D.
WNK/
D :
**DATE[Mar 16 2007] 11:26:40
T :
**DATE[Mar 16 2007] 22:27:29
R :
**DATE[Mar 17 2007] 13:13:48/sd
Job ID :
348203/**ID-NUM
Cc:
*** Dictated By :
-**NAME[XXX , TTT M]. ***
Electronically Signed by **NAME[WWW XXX]
**DATE[Mar 23 2007] 03:12:58 PM
